channel.title: Error Running Source~ Please Help!
channel.description:
so ive been having this problem for a couple days now still lookin for help. btw im using trisidiax v2 source and client so one day i wanted to add in an item id on my prices.txt then i compile it completely without a problem or an error. but then when i run it, i get this error....
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:504) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:319) at server.world.ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:35) at server.Server.(clinit)(Servers.java:67)[/code]
can anyone tell what to do to fix this by looking at the error above? cuz i know i did something to the prices and (MAYBE) something with the items to make this error happen but i dont fully remember what i did...
Thanks a lot for your time! :)
btw line 319 says...
ItemList temp = getItemList(Integer.parseInt(line[0]));

item.title: Error Running Source~ Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @ventona ventona
item.description:
@ventona wrote:

so ive been having this problem for a couple days now still lookin for help.
btw im using trisidiax v2 source and client
so one day i wanted to add in an item id on my prices.txt then i compile it completely without a problem or an error. but then when i run it, i get this error…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:504) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:319) at server.world.ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:35) at server.Server.(clinit)(Servers.java:67)

can anyone tell what to do to fix this by looking at the error above? cuz i know i did something to the prices and (MAYBE) something with the items to make this error happen but i dont fully remember what i did…

Thanks a lot for your time!

btw line 319 says…

ItemList temp = getItemList(Integer.parseInt(line[0]));
